column5: Hey gent's, hope all is well with everyone! I haven't been posting much in recent weeks, but for good reason, I've been averaging 4 days a week on the water the last month or so. Things are slowly starting to wind down for me now as it gets colder (my old bones can't take it).  When I get the chance I'll post a few highlights, it's been a remarkable fall season.  Anyhow, onto the reason for this post. For those of you who enjoy river fishing for anadromous fish you will love this video.  Truly amazing place. Not quite sure how, but someday I'll fish it.
My post went wonky. If someone could fix it I'd appreciate it.
http://vimeo.com/39620554
Mike if I ever win the loto you and I will go fish the Kamchaka Peninsula. This full video is awesome
Crazy....
Could I join you guys?,what a river system!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!.talk about isolation,would be just a dream at this point for me.Thanks for sharing Mike.
Hey Mike.. have you been told this week?
These guys take their fishing way too seriously! lol  LUV IT!  Cheers, Ron...
that was cool nice clip
Reminds me of Glen Haffy during the opener.       On second thought...
Sweet video
For a second there I thought you were in Russia....I wouldn't be surprised if you were

Mike if I ever win the loto you and I will go fish the Kamchaka Peninsula. This full video is awesome   Sweet buddy, I'm in! And if I win it's on me.  Hey Mike.. have you been told this week?  By who and regarding what? LOL!  For a second there I thought you were in Russia....I wouldn't be surprised if you were

In the video, the camp keeps accurate stats of fish/ rod/ week, when Mike does get there, I bet he's got a shot at setting the camp record  looks like a magical river, hopefully all the nuts and bolts are snug on those Russian helicopters though
Wow!  Amazing video.  That's a lot of scrappy Atlantics to play with!!!  I would love to use my float rod on the Ponoi...
I would love to use my float rod on the Ponoi...  Sacrelige!
I'm almost certain you'll get some weird looks
Chronzy needs to watch this, LMAO
Chronzy needs to watch this, LMAO  He would need a whole other Helicopter for his deep-fry equipment

From the title, I thought you had gone to Russia to fish - needs lots of coin for that trip!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  They have some really nice fish there - I know some people who have gone there and fished, it was fun to fly in helicopters that were held together by baling wire and burned kerosene. Regardless they had some of the best atlantic Salmon fishing ever.
